ayahs.textUthmani: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: ۞ قَالَ [He said] فَمَا [Then what] خَطْبُكُمْ [(is) your mission] أَيُّهَا [O messengers] ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ [O messengers]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala fama khatbukumayyuha almursaloon

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالُوٓا۟ [They said] إِنَّآ [Indeed, we] أُرْسِلْنَآ [[we] have been sent] إِلَىٰ [to] قَوْمٍۢ [a people] مُّجْرِمِينَ [criminal]
ayahs.transliteration: Qaloo inna orsilna ilaqawmin mujrimeen

ayahs.textUthmani: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: لِنُرْسِلَ [That we may send down] عَلَيْهِمْ [upon them] حِجَارَةًۭ [stones] مِّن [of] طِينٍۢ [clay]
ayahs.transliteration: Linursila AAalayhim hijaratanmin teen

ayahs.textUthmani: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: مُّسَوَّمَةً [Marked] عِندَ [by your Lord] رَبِّكَ [by your Lord] لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ [for the transgressors]
ayahs.transliteration: Musawwamatan AAinda rabbika lilmusrifeen

ayahs.textUthmani: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَأَخْرَجْنَا [Then We brought out] مَن [(those) who] كَانَ [were] فِيهَا [therein] مِنَ [of] ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ [the believers]
ayahs.transliteration: Faakhrajna man kana feehamina almu/mineen

ayahs.textUthmani: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَمَا [But not] وَجَدْنَا [We found] فِيهَا [therein] غَيْرَ [other than] بَيْتٍۢ [a house] مِّنَ [of] ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ [the Muslims]
ayahs.transliteration: Fama wajadna feehaghayra baytin mina almuslimeen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَتَرَكْنَا [And We left] فِيهَآ [therein] ءَايَةًۭ [a Sign] لِّلَّذِينَ [for those who] يَخَافُونَ [fear] ٱلْعَذَابَ [the punishment] ٱلْأَلِيمَ [the painful]
ayahs.transliteration: Watarakna feeha ayatanlillatheena yakhafoona alAAathaba al-aleem

ayahs.textUthmani: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَفِى [And in] مُوسَىٰٓ [Musa] إِذْ [when] أَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ [We sent him] إِلَىٰ [to] فِرْعَوْنَ [Firaun] بِسُلْطَـٰنٍۢ [with an authority] مُّبِينٍۢ [clear]
ayahs.transliteration: Wafee moosa ith arsanahuila firAAawna bisultanin mubeen

ayahs.textUthmani: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَـٰحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَتَوَلَّىٰ [But he turned away] بِرُكْنِهِۦ [with his supporters] وَقَالَ [and said] سَـٰحِرٌ [A magician] أَوْ [or] مَجْنُونٌۭ [a madman]
ayahs.transliteration: Fatawalla biruknihi waqala sahirunaw majnoon

ayahs.textUthmani: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ [So We took him] وَجُنُودَهُۥ [and his hosts] فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ [and threw them] فِى [into] ٱلْيَمِّ [the sea] وَهُوَ [while he] مُلِيمٌۭ [(was) blameworthy]
ayahs.transliteration: Faakhathnahu wajunoodahufanabathnahum fee alyammi wahuwa muleem

ayahs.textUthmani: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَفِى [And in] عَادٍ [Aad] إِذْ [when] أَرْسَلْنَا [We sent] عَلَيْهِمُ [against them] ٱلرِّيحَ [the wind] ٱلْعَقِيمَ [the barren]
ayahs.transliteration: Wafee AAadin ith arsalnaAAalayhimu arreeha alAAaqeem

ayahs.textUthmani: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَىْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
ayahs.wordByWord: مَا [Not] تَذَرُ [it left] مِن [any] شَىْءٍ [thing] أَتَتْ [it came] عَلَيْهِ [upon it] إِلَّا [but] جَعَلَتْهُ [it made it] كَٱلرَّمِيمِ [like disintegrated ruins]
ayahs.transliteration: Ma tatharu min shay-in atatAAalayhi illa jaAAalat-hu karrameem

ayahs.textUthmani: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَفِى [And in] ثَمُودَ [Thamud] إِذْ [when] قِيلَ [was said] لَهُمْ [to them] تَمَتَّعُوا۟ [Enjoy (yourselves)] حَتَّىٰ [for] حِينٍۢ [a time]
ayahs.transliteration: Wafee thamooda ith qeela lahumtamattaAAoo hatta heen

ayahs.textUthmani: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَعَتَوْا۟ [But they rebelled] عَنْ [against] أَمْرِ [(the) Command] رَبِّهِمْ [(of) their Lord] فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ [so seized them] ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ [the thunderbolt] وَهُمْ [while they] يَنظُرُونَ [were looking]
ayahs.transliteration: FaAAataw AAan amri rabbihim faakhathat-humuassaAAiqatu wahum yanthuroon

ayahs.textUthmani: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَمَا [Then not] ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ [they were able to] مِن [[of]] قِيَامٍۢ [stand] وَمَا [and not] كَانُوا۟ [they could] مُنتَصِرِينَ [help themselves]
ayahs.transliteration: Fama istataAAoo min qiyaminwama kanoo muntasireen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَقَوْمَ [And (the) people] نُوحٍۢ [(of) Nuh] مِّن [before] قَبْلُ ۖ [before] إِنَّهُمْ [indeed, they] كَانُوا۟ [were] قَوْمًۭا [a people] فَـٰسِقِينَ [defiantly disobedient]
ayahs.transliteration: Waqawma noohin min qablu innahum kanooqawman fasiqeen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا بِأَيْي۟دٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ [And the heaven] بَنَيْنَـٰهَا [We constructed it] بِأَيْي۟دٍۢ [with strength] وَإِنَّا [and indeed, We] لَمُوسِعُونَ [(are) surely (its) Expanders]
ayahs.transliteration: Wassamaa banaynahabi-aydin wa-inna lamoosiAAoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱلْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَـٰهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱلْأَرْضَ [And the earth] فَرَشْنَـٰهَا [We have spread it] فَنِعْمَ [how excellent] ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ [(are) the Spreaders]
ayahs.transliteration: Wal-arda farashnahafaniAAma almahidoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَمِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَمِن [And of] كُلِّ [every] شَىْءٍ [thing] خَلَقْنَا [We have created] زَوْجَيْنِ [pairs] لَعَلَّكُمْ [so that you may] تَذَكَّرُونَ [remember]
ayahs.transliteration: Wamin kulli shay-in khalaqna zawjaynilaAAallakum tathakkaroon

ayahs.textUthmani: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ [So flee] إِلَى [to] ٱللَّهِ ۖ [Allah] إِنِّى [indeed, I am] لَكُم [to you] مِّنْهُ [from Him] نَذِيرٌۭ [a warner] مُّبِينٌۭ [clear]
ayahs.transliteration: Fafirroo ila Allahi inneelakum minhu natheerun mubeen

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَا [And (do) not] تَجْعَلُوا۟ [make] مَعَ [with] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] إِلَـٰهًا [god] ءَاخَرَ ۖ [another] إِنِّى [Indeed, I am] لَكُم [to you] مِّنْهُ [from Him] نَذِيرٌۭ [a warner] مُّبِينٌۭ [clear]
ayahs.transliteration: Wala tajAAaloo maAAa Allahi ilahanakhara innee lakum minhu natheerun mubeen
